article_title: Why North Carolina Should Still Say No To Obamacare's Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: North Carolina's Medicaid program is now undergoing reform in which managed care companies and regional provider-led networks will compete to deliver care for patients within a defined budget. The idea is to achieve better budget predictability while improving the value of health care for the state's most vulnerable citizens. A recent legislative oversight [...]
article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo
